column4: I have a folder in Trash that I dont have permission to delete. How do I get rid of it?
You could give yourself permission using the "chown" command.
Thanks. What is the path to items in trash?
Good question!  I'm not really sure. :)
It's a hidden folder in your /home directory: "/home/JonathanEllis/.Trash"
Yes I have tried that. The error I get is in my pastebin
It sounds to me (this is mostly speculation) that the hard drive is going bad.
Are there I/O errors in dmesg?
I'm not sure how to identify errors in dmesg. 'dmesg | grep error' doesnt produce any output
just run "dmesg" and look near the end of it
I don't think so but I am not sure. My dmesg output is at http://pastebin.com/d48df6442
There are no I/O errors in there
